item.title: From Poverty to Prosperity: Understanding Economic Development
item.description: This includes the notes of From Poverty to Prosperity: Understanding Economic Development course taught by Sir Paul Collier. The course can be learnt from edx.org.

item.title: Disclosure in Financial Market: Costs and Benefits
item.description: This article explains the costs and benefits of corporate disclosure in financial market.

item.title: Probability
item.description: This includes the notes related to probability. This note contains parts that I learnt from the Probability and Statistics course of Georgia Tech university’s edx.org

item.title: Differential Equation
item.description: This includes the notes related to differential equation. This note contains parts that I learnt from the Differential Equation course of Rice university’s.

item.title: Financial literacy: Beyond Investor Protection
item.description: This article explains the need for financial literacy for economic growth and stability.

item.title: Financing for Greener Future: Exploring the potential of green bonds in Nepal
item.description: This article explains the need for and challenges of green financing in nepal.
